    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean gamerAbilityIsCooldown(Gamer gamer, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if the given ability is on cooldown for the given gamer, ignoring if the player actually can use the given ability
      Boolean gamerCanUseAbility(Gamer gamer, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if that gamer has the given ability and the ability is not on cooldown.
      Boolean gamerhasAbility(Gamer gamer, Integer abilityID)
      Returns true if that gamer has the given ability, ignoring cooldown.
      static BukkitGamesAPI getApi()
      Returns a BukkitGames API instance.
      Gamer getGamer(Player player)
      Returns the gamer object for that player.
      GameState getGameState()
      Returns the current GameState.
      Boolean playerAbilityIsCooldown(Player player, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if the given ability is on cooldown for the given player, ignoring if the player actually can use the given ability
      Boolean playerCanUseAbility(Player player, Integer abilityID, Boolean message)
      Returns true if that player has the given ability and the ability is not on cooldown.
      Boolean playerhasAbility(Player player, Integer abilityID)
      Returns true if that player has the given ability, ignoring cooldown.
      void registerAbility(Ability ability)
      Registers a new ability, needs to be called in onEnable().
      void setGamerCooldown(Gamer gamer, Integer abilityID, Integer seconds)
      Sets a cooldown for an ability of that gamer.
      void setPlayerCooldown(Player player, Integer abilityID, Integer seconds)
      Sets a cooldown for an ability of that player.

      • playerCanUseAbility

        public Boolean playerCanUseAbility(Player player,
                          Integer abilityID,
                          Boolean message)
        Returns true if that player has the given ability and the ability is not on cooldown. Will send a message to the player, if message is set to true and ability is on cooldown.
        Parameters:
        player -
        abilityID -
        message -
        Returns:
        Boolean
